about.title: About Service
about.subtitle: Your gateway to authentic football memories
about.description: Fan's Dream is a premium platform for collectors and football enthusiasts, offering exclusive match-worn shirts, star autographs, and unique sports memorabilia.

framing.title: Framing Services
framing.subtitle: Professional framing for your trophies
framing.description: Our craftsmen create the perfect frame for your shirt or memorabilia using museum-quality materials and modern conservation techniques.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: Collaborating with industry leaders
partners.description: We work with leading football clubs, auction houses, and authentication experts to ensure the highest quality of goods.
partners.cooperation_description: To start cooperation, you can fill out the form on our website or contact us by email: <0>{{email}}</0>. We will be happy to discuss partnership terms and answer all your questions.

form.checkbox_personal_data: I consent to the processing and storage of my personal data. *

validation.agree_to_personal_data: Agreement to personal data processing is required

notifications.partnership_success: Your partnership request has been successfully sent! We will contact you soon.
notifications.partnership_error: An error occurred while sending your partnership request. Please try again later.

income.title: Additional Income Source
income.description: We provide athletes and clubs with the opportunity to increase their income through the sale of unique sports goods that previously could not be officially sold. This opens new financial horizons and allows effective monetization of exclusive items.

fans.title: Strengthening Fan Connections
fans.description: Our platform provides fans with access to exclusive goods, which helps strengthen the connection between clubs, athletes, and their fans. This, in turn, increases fan loyalty and commitment to the partner brand.

innovation.title: Innovative Solutions
innovation.description: We offer unique trading formats, such as auctions for selling collectible goods, which ensures maximum transparency and high selling value. The implementation of NFC chips for product authenticity verification guarantees a high degree of trust and confidence in product originality.

premium.title: Premium Service
premium.description: Every product sold on our platform is processed with attention to detail â€” from professional photography and exclusive packaging to express delivery and framing in the workshop. This emphasizes the value of goods and contributes to creating a positive image for partners.

flexible.title: Flexible Cooperation Formats
flexible.description: We offer individual cooperation terms for each partner, which allows building long-term and mutually beneficial relationships that meet the needs and goals of athletes and clubs.

transparency.title: Transparency and Reliability
transparency.description: We guarantee complete transparency of all operations, providing our partners with detailed reporting. This ensures confidence in the reliability of our cooperation and full compliance with contractual obligations.

charity.title: Charity
charity.description: Cooperation with our platform gives partners the opportunity to support charitable initiatives by directing part of the proceeds to socially important projects, which strengthens the public image of the brand and contributes to positive changes in society.

audience.title: Wide Audience
audience.description: Our platform covers a wide range of sports disciplines, which attracts a large audience interested in purchasing unique sports memorabilia. This expands opportunities for brand promotion and increases sales volumes.

authenticate.title: Authentication
authenticate.subtitle: Guaranteed authenticity of every item
authenticate.description: Every item in our collection undergoes rigorous authenticity verification using modern technology and expert evaluation.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.subtitle: Safe worldwide shipping
delivery.description: We provide reliable and insured delivery of your valuable purchases with full tracking and professional packaging.

help.subtitle: We're ready to help you with any questions

help.success_message: Your request has been sent successfully

framing_baguette.subtitle: Classic framing
framing_baguette.description: Traditional wooden baguette framing to create an elegant look.

framing_acrylic.title: Acrylic Framing
framing_acrylic.subtitle: Modern framing solution
framing_acrylic.description: Modern acrylic framing for a stylish and contemporary display.

framing1.title: Create a museum exhibit from your lot
framing1.description:
Each item is delivered in Fan's Dream branded packaging, high-value items â€” in branded gift boxes.

For most unique sports items, professional framing services are offered that emphasize their significance and ensure reliability. The solutions used, such as baguette frames and acrylic cases, guarantee not only preservation but also an elegant appearance.

T-shirts, jerseys and sweaters are framed in a specialized baguette workshop that specializes in artistic framing of sports memorabilia. Customization is available for our clients, including choice of materials, colors, glass and inscriptions, allowing you to create unique framing that matches the individual wishes of the owner.

For skates, pucks, boots and other items, acrylic cases are created that provide reliable protection, allowing you to preserve the appearance of items in perfect condition, emphasizing their value and exclusivity.

standard.title: Standard packaging
standard.description: Reliable and stylish packaging that ensures product protection during transportation.

gift_box.title: Gift box
gift_box.description: Exclusive gift box for items worth from 10,000 â‚½, emphasizing the value and uniqueness of the item.

frames.title: Baguette frames
frames.description: Perfect framing for t-shirts, jerseys and sweaters, with the ability to customize materials, colors and inscriptions.

acrylic_cases.title: Acrylic cases
acrylic_cases.description: Stylish and reliable acrylic case for protection and storage of skates, pucks and other sports items.

steps.step1: Place a bid, win the auction and pay for the won items.
steps.step3: Choose the framing option that interests you.
steps.step4: Confirm your choice, pay for framing services and wait for delivery of the finished item.

two_factor_auth.description: 2FA requires an additional code from your phone when logging into your account. This protects your account even if someone knows your password.
two_factor_auth.setup_step1_description: Install one of these apps on your phone:
two_factor_auth.setup_step2_description: Open the app and scan this QR code:
two_factor_auth.setup_step3_description: Enter the 6-digit code from your app:

authentication.title: Create Verification Elements
authentication.description: Create authentication codes for item with NFC chip
authentication.tag_id_help: 14 characters A-F, 0-9. Colons and spaces are removed automatically
authentication.nfc_description: Link for writing to NFC chip (NTAG 213)
authentication.encrypted_data: Contains encrypted data: itemId, publicCode, tagId, secretKey
authentication.codes_already_exist: Authentication codes for this item already exist
authentication.codes_already_exist_notification: Codes for this item are already created
authentication.step1_description: To write codes to the chip, download
authentication.step2_description: To find Tag ID - open the app on the "Read" tab and find Serial Number - this is the tag id.
authentication.tag_id_format_note: tag ID is formatted automatically - just copy Serial Number from the app.
authentication.write_step2: 2. In the "Write" section select "Add a record"
authentication.write_step4_desc: Enter link in format "fansdream.ru/a?t={TAG_ID}&h=..." where h is specified above.
authentication.write_step4_warning: TagID should not be entered manually - select {TAG_ID} from the parameters button on the right!
authentication.write_step7: 7. Bring NFC chip close and wait for write confirmation
authentication.write_step8: 8. For verification - exit the app and bring NFC tag to phone - authenticity confirmation page should open.
authentication.write_step9: 9. After successful writing and verification - open "Other" tab
authentication.lock_warning: locked tag (steps 9-12) cannot be rewritten! Always verify data validity (step 8) before locking!
authentication.method1_warning: âš ï¸ If the link doesn't open, try installing a free app like NFC Tools or Smart NFC and scan the NFC chip with it.
authentication.scanning_benefits_title: By scanning the chip, you get:
authentication.scanning_benefit2: details about the product, athlete and event;
authentication.scanning_benefit3: a secure, unforgeable digital mark that forever anchors this item in sports history.
authentication.method2_step1: Open the camera on your phone
authentication.method2_step2: Point it at the QR code on the certificate
authentication.method2_step4: An electronic certificate of authenticity will open
authentication.method3_label: Enter the unique code (indicated on the certificate or NFC chip) in the form below to verify authenticity:
authentication.title: Product Authenticity
authentication.intro_text: All our products come directly from athletes and clubs, which guarantees their 100% authenticity. Each item is accompanied by a certificate of authenticity with a unique number and QR code for online verification. In particularly valuable textile products, we also embed NFC chips that can be scanned with a phone.
authentication.nfc_chips_title: ðŸ“² NFC Chips: Future Technology in Sports History
authentication.nfc_chips_description: We use advanced NFC technology to give you unique access to information about your item.
authentication.method1_step1: Bring the back of your phone to the chip area
authentication.method1_step3: An electronic certificate will open with complete product information

auction_rules.title: ONLINE AUCTION RULES IN FAN'S DREAM ONLINE STORE

content.1.1: 1.1. This document (hereinafter - "Rules") contains all essential conditions for participation of individuals (hereinafter - "Participants") in open competitive bidding in electronic form (hereinafter - "Auctions"), conducted by Individual Entrepreneur Zabezhinsky Dmitry Ilyich (OGRNIP: 325784700063390, INN: 781304608018, hereinafter - "Organizer") in the Fan's Dream Online Store, which is an Internet site with the domain name fansdream.ru, as well as the Fan's Dream mobile application (hereinafter - "Online Store").
content.1.2: 1.2. Auctions are held to determine the person offering the highest price for unique sports goods and services of professional sports clubs offered by the Platform (hereinafter - "Winner"). The Winner receives the right to conclude contracts for the sale and purchase of Goods and provision of Services (hereinafter - "Contracts").
content.1.3: 1.3. The conditions provided for by the Public Offer of the Fan's Dream Online Store (hereinafter - "Offer") apply to the procedure for the execution of Contracts, unless otherwise provided by the Rules (in particular, but not limited to, conditions on payment, delivery, return of Goods, refusal of Services or cancellation of Services by the Organizer. The Organizer becomes the Seller in the terminology of the Offer, and the Winner - the Client).
content.1.3_continuation: In case of contradiction between the Rules and the Offer to Contracts concluded as a result of Auctions, the Rules apply. Terms used in the Rules with a capital letter have the meaning provided for by the Offer, unless otherwise expressly provided for by the Rules.
content.1.4: 1.4. The Rules may be changed by the Organizer without any special notice, the new version of the Rules comes into force from the moment of its placement on the Site, unless otherwise provided for by the new version of the Rules, and does not apply to legal relations between the Organizer and Participants that arose before the new version of the Rules came into force.
content.1.5: 1.5. The legislation of the Russian Federation applies to relations between the Organizer and Participants.
content.1.5_continuation: In case of questions and claims from the Participant, he can contact support@fansdream.ru All disputes that arise, the Organizer and the Participant will strive to resolve through negotiations, if no agreement is reached, the dispute may be submitted for consideration to the court in accordance with the current legislation of the Russian Federation.

content.2.1: 2.1. Any capable individual who has reached the age of 18 and has an Account in the Online Store can be a Participant of the Auction.
content.2.2: 2.2. To participate in Auctions, when creating an Account, the Participant indicates the following data necessary for identification by the Organizer: last name, first name, patronymic, delivery address of Goods, contact phone number, e-mail, bank card data provided for by the Online Store interface.
content.2.2_continuation: Identification is carried out by offering the Participant to enter verification codes sent by the Organizer in SMS messages and emails to the contact details specified by the Participant, as well as by test debiting an amount from 1 to 11 rubles from the bank card specified by the Participant with subsequent return of the debited amount.
content.2.3: 2.3. Participants who have not indicated all the data requested by the Online Store interface or who have not passed identification are not allowed to participate in Auctions.
content.2.3_continuation: Participants who have passed identification receive the opportunity to place bids within active Auctions through the Online Store interface.
content.2.4: 2.4. Participants who have violated any provision of the Rules may be denied participation in any Auctions, and the action of their Account may be restricted by the Organizer.

content.3.1: 3.1. Auction documentation for the purposes of the Rules means information specified in the Cards of auction Goods and Services (hereinafter jointly - "Lots"). The Organizer ensures that the Cards indicate descriptions of Lots (including History of Goods), terms of the Auction (including countdown to start and end), starting price of the Lot, last highest bid at the moment (in relation to active auctions).
content.3.2: 3.2. On the day of the start of the Auction in relation to the corresponding Lot, the Auction becomes active, i.e. the Online Store interface provides the opportunity to place bids. By placing a bid, the Participant confirms his familiarization with the Rules and auction documentation.
content.3.3: 3.3. Auctions are held in Russian rubles. The Auction may provide for a minimum bid step specified in the Online Store interface. The Participant must place a bid that exceeds the last highest bid at the moment, indicated in the Card, taking into account the size of the minimum bid step, if applicable.
content.3.4: 3.4. The Organizer notifies the Participant about placed bids, about bids of other Participants exceeding the one placed by the Participant, about the Participant's victory in the Auction and the issuance of an invoice for payment of the Lot by means of emails, SMS messages to the contact details specified by the Participant, as well as using push notifications in the Application. By placing a bid, the Participant agrees to receive the specified notifications. The Participant can configure preferences regarding mailings in the Personal Account.
content.3.5: 3.5. Until the end of the Auction period specified in the Card, the Organizer has the right to remove any Lot from trading without explanation. The Organizer has the right to change the beginning of an unstarted Auction by changing information about this in the Card.
content.3.6: 3.6. The Auction is considered completed on the day and hour specified in the Card. The winner of the Auction is the Participant who offered the highest price for the Lot. The Organizer places in the Card a protocol - information about the size of the winning bid or information that the Auction is recognized as not having taken place in cases provided for by the legislation of the Russian Federation.

content.4.1: 4.1. The Winner undertakes to conclude a Contract with the Organizer by making payment for the Lot within 24 hours from the moment of receiving notification of victory by the methods provided for in clause 3.4 of the Rules and placing an invoice in the Personal Account.
content.4.2: 4.2. The amount specified in the invoice consists of the size of the winning bid, the Organizer's commission, which is 10% of the amount of the winning bid, and the cost of delivery of the Goods (applicable for Auctions for Goods). The Winner also has the right to request Additional services in relation to Goods, in relation to which the Organizer forms a separate invoice.
content.4.3: 4.3. The Winner makes payment only by non-cash online payment or Gift Certificate in accordance with the conditions of sections 6 and 7 of the Offer.
content.4.4: 4.4. The Winner who has not paid the invoice within the period established by clause 4.1 of the Rules loses the right to conclude the Contract.
content.4.4_continuation: The Organizer has the right, at its discretion, to hold a repeated Auction in relation to such a Lot, offer the Participant who made the second highest bid to conclude a Contract, or dispose of the Lot in another way at its discretion.
content.4.5: 4.5 If the Auction is recognized as not having taken place due to the participation of a single Participant in it, such Participant hereby agrees that the bid made by him is an offer to conclude a Contract with the Organizer in relation to the Lot at a price corresponding to the bid made.
content.4.5_continuation: The Organizer has the right to accept such an offer and conclude a Contract with such a Participant or dispose of the Lot at its discretion. The acceptance of the offer of the single Participant will be considered the sending to him in the Personal Account of an invoice for payment of the Lot in the amount provided for in clause 4.2 of the Rules, subject to payment within the time limits established by clause 4.1 of the Rules.
